description: Gets information about a Device Defender ML Detect mitigation action. Requires permission to access the DescribeDetectMitigationActionsTask action.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task.

nested_items.name: taskSummary
nested_items.description: The description of a task.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the task.

nested_items.name: taskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the task.

nested_items.name: taskStartTime
nested_items.description: The date the task started.

nested_items.name: taskEndTime
nested_items.description: The date the task ended.

nested_items.name: violationIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifiers of the violations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the security profile.

nested_items.name: behaviorName
nested_items.description: The name of the behavior.

nested_items.name: violationEventOccurrenceRange
nested_items.description: Specifies the time period of which violation events occurred between.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start date and time of a time period in which violation events occurred.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end date and time of a time period in which violation events occurred.

nested_items.name: onlyActiveViolationsIncluded
nested_items.description: Includes only active violations.

nested_items.name: suppressedAlertsIncluded
nested_items.description: Includes suppressed alerts.

nested_items.name: actionsDefinition
nested_items.description: The definition of the actions.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A user-friendly name for the mitigation action.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the mitigation action.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN used to apply this mitigation action.

nested_items.name: actionParams
nested_items.description: The set of parameters for this mitigation action. The parameters vary, depending on the kind of action you apply.

nested_items.name: updateDeviceCertificateParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that changes the state of the device certificate to inactive.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action that you want to apply to the device certificate. The only supported value is DEACTIVATE.

nested_items.name: updateCACertificateParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that changes the state of the CA certificate to inactive.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action that you want to apply to the CA certificate. The only supported value is DEACTIVATE.

nested_items.name: addThingsToThingGroupParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that moves devices associated with a certificate to one or more specified thing groups, typically for quarantine.

nested_items.name: thingGroupNames
nested_items.description: The list of groups to which you want to add the things that triggered the mitigation action. You can add a thing to a maximum of 10 groups, but you can't add a thing to more than one group in the same hierarchy.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: overrideDynamicGroups
nested_items.description: Specifies if this mitigation action can move the things that triggered the mitigation action even if they are part of one or more dynamic thing groups.

nested_items.name: replaceDefaultPolicyVersionParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that adds a blank policy to restrict permissions.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the template to be applied. The only supported value is BLANK_POLICY.

nested_items.name: enableIoTLoggingParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that enables Amazon Web Services IoT Core logging at a specified level of detail.

nested_items.name: roleArnForLogging
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used for logging.

nested_items.name: logLevel
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of information to be logged.

nested_items.name: publishFindingToSnsParams
nested_items.description: Parameters to define a mitigation action that publishes findings to Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS. You can implement your own custom actions in response to the Amazon SNS messages.

nested_items.name: topicArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the topic to which you want to publish the findings.

nested_items.name: taskStatistics
nested_items.description: The statistics of a mitigation action task.

nested_items.name: actionsExecuted
nested_items.description: The actions that were performed.

nested_items.name: actionsSkipped
nested_items.description: The actions that were skipped.

nested_items.name: actionsFailed
nested_items.description: The actions that failed.
